post:
We are **Virtono**.com and sell both Managed([shared](https://www.virtono.com/website-hosting) and [dedicated ](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-hosting)) and Unmanaged( [Cloud VPS](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps) and [dedicated](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances)) cloud hosting services.


---

Below you will find our offers to LET users. The prices are in Euros, so here is today's exchange rate: 1 Euro equals 1.21 US dollars.

------- **Coupon Code** ----------

Use **25HAPPY2021** coupon at checkout and save **25% lifetime**. This coupon is available for ALL services from [www.virtono.com](https://www.virtono.com) website, not just for the offers posted here! It applies all billing cycles, even if semi-annually & yearly billing cycles are already insanely discounted.

Since our founding in 2014, we happily served thousand of clients from all over the world and we continually searched for new ways to deliver on our mission: High Quality at Fair Prices. We are now very proud that we discovered and adjusted the right combination of qualitative and affordable web hosting solutions.

We built our team around colleagues with valuable experience in web hosting, virtualization, cloud infrastructure, and customer support. Our management has over 15 years of executive experience in Romanian's top telecom companies. 



We have a new website and a new cloud platform. Top features for our new Cloud infrastructure includes:

1. Raid protected SSD storage( & clustered filesystem)
2. Fast Network - Each node is connected to multiple 10Gb networks
3. Internal IPs - your VPS can now "talk" with another VPS or virtual machine from the same datacenter through a private network.
4. SSH Keys  - are installed with just a few clicks from our cloud panel.
5. Instant Activation - Your virtual server will be automatically provisioned after payment.
6. Custom ISO - you can upload your own iso and install OS via VNC on [cloud virtual machines](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vm) and [dedicated instances](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances).

You can manage, get multiple IP addresses, or upgrade your server directly from the client area. We have also a cloud panel to: Reinstall OS, Stop/Start VPS, change the configuration, or set up rDNS.


The payment methods are PayPal, online Credit Card, Skrill, Bitcoin & Altcoins  Bank Wire Transfer, AliPay, etc.
